item.title: Jamstack
item.description: JAMstack Fast, secure sites & dynamic apps Served without webservers The JAMstack is not about specific technologies (about operating systems, specific web servers, backend programming languages, or databases). Itâ€™s about following some paradigms with building the web that delivers better performance, higher security, lower cost of scaling, and a better developer experience. JavaScript APIs Markup JAM A site made with the JAMstack doesn't have to include all of these attributes J: Any dynamic programming during the request/response cycle is handled by JavaScript, running entirely on the client.
